attributes.action: Ban MPs from next general election if they can not agree on Brexit by April 12th
attributes.additional_details: Brexiteer or Remainder, this has gone for too long. whether this is a new vote or a no-deal Brexit, our MPs must agree on the way forward, This is why they are elected and paid.
attributes.background:
MPs have been unable to do their job effectively and their actions are now harming the UK. They should be treated like any civil servant or employee which underperforms. 
Why Would the UK want to rehire someone who has demonstrated to be unable to find compromises and deliver/perform on their job?

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.

You might like to sign and share this petition instead. 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/249457
